title: Gamification Learning Design: Managerial Leadership Competency Enhancement Program

context.prior_knowledge: Basic digital device operation skills, organizational management experience
context.additional_context: A gamified environment based on real workplace cases, measuring learning outcomes through project-based assessments.

learning_goals: Learners enhance decision-making skills by performing role-play missions on a gamification platform with over 85% engagement
Learners can derive at least three context-based design strategies for situational problem-solving by week 4
Learners achieve over 80% completion rate in leadership scenario games through cumulative self-directed exploration activities exceeding 20 hours by course completion
Learners plan and execute team collaboration simulations by applying a gamification design framework in the final project
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
